title: You have been disconnected for prolonged inactivity. The game will now exit.
body:
After being stuck in the loading screen for more than 5 minutes, "You have been disconnected for prolonged inactivity. The game will now exit.".
Had to load the game again taking me another 1-2 minutes just to play the game. Why is this shit in the game? 

When I got to the game the enemy Ezreal was already level 9...

replies.body:
It's obviously your connection in one way or another. 
I often get false firewall dialog boxes on loading and immediately re-log the client so i don't miss the first 1-2min of game.

Just be vigilant and if you are not loading in the adequate time-frame, alt+f4 and re log. GG

I will quote a game a love very dearly.

"Dude, blame your ISP" - Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings taunt

I get this in ARAMs quite often and then people complain and when I explain most the time they are like "Cool excuse, reported AFK" etc.
Incase by some miracle a Developer read this; 
4gb RAM, 
Intel core i5-2410M
64bit operating system.
Do not understand why I would get such a weird bug with my specs and also I get 32 latency so it's not that.

It is nothing to do with your PC specs.

It's connectivity/ISP etc.

That would be because your system is behind, could be either your computer or your internet.

Either way you are taking too long to load, and therefore the game thinks you aren't there.
